reviewText: I love old movies & Im happy to have this one added to my collection

I already own this version of the Ten Commandments and enjoy it; the first two of the four story set were bleary and the music styles were more like "spaghetti westerns". The third one was okay, and the last one was unbearable! It was a disgrace to the Jewish people portrayed. I usually view any movie to its end however, the three I described were only worth 15 minutes.
so so - some okay, some not so okay, others rather bad....

No where did it say that the movies on the CD are very old and poor...we were not happy with them. They were bought for a senior facility in skilled nursing and they did not like them at allllllll....
I like the set, and some of the movies are good, others are ok.

I got this out of the $5.00 bin at Walmart. So the price is expensive but I also didn't expect the highest quality. I am very happy with my purchase but I wouldn't buy it from Amazon. Look in the bins at Walmart.
Old movies don't have good quality pictures.
